Administrative Accountant Job at Deepee Industrials Limited




        
    

        
        Deepee Industrials Limited, established in 2008, is an engineering and industrial distribution company headquartered in Lagos State with regional offices in Delta, Kano, and Rivers States. We specialize in providing high-quality industrial spares and consumables, offering personnel training, and servicing industrial equipment. Our product offerings include high-performance drive belts, pumps, conveyor belts, and energy chains, electric motors sourced from globally renowned partners.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Administrative Accountant

Job Location: Lagos
Job type: Full-time (On-site)

Role Description
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	This is a full-time, on-site role located in Lagos for an Administrative Accountant. The Administrative Accountant will handle day-to-day financial tasks, including preparing and analyzing financial statements, invoicing, bookkeeping, and general accounting duties.
	The role requires meticulous attention to detail, the ability to manage financial records accurately, and ensure compliance with financial regulations.
	The Administrative Accountant will also interface with all compliance agencies such as NRS (formerly FIRS), PENCOM, NCDMB, NSITF, etc. on behalf of the company.


Qualifications


	Bachelor’s degree in Accounting, Finance, or a related field
	Professional certification (e.g., CPA, ACCA) is a plus.
	Financial Statements and General Accounting skills
	Analytical Skills
	Invoicing and Bookkeeping skills
	Proficiency in accounting software, Zoho Books, and MS Office Suite
	Strong organizational and time management skills
	Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Applications to: hr@deepeeindustrials.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.
